required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Anlotinib Combined With Sintilimab as Second-line Treatment or Beyond in Patients With Small Cell Lung Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Anlotinib Combined With Sintilimab as Second-line Treatment or Beyond in Patients With Small Cell Lung Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Changzhou Cancer Hospital of Soochow University

clinical_study.source: Changzhou Cancer Hospital of Soochow University

brief_summary.textblock: Immunotherapy combined with anti-angiogenic therapy can achieve better results in patients with second-line and above small cell lung cancer

detailed_description.textblock: Through this study, it was found that Anlotinib combined with Sintilimab has a better survival benefit. At the same time, genetic analysis and immunohistochemical methods have been used to predict the predictive value of targeted therapy combined with Sintilimab.

primary_outcome.time_frame: At least 1 year following the conclusion of immunotherapy
primary_outcome.description: PFS is defined as the length of time from random assignment to disease progression or to death resulting from any cause other than the progress.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At least 1 year following the conclusion of immunotherapy
secondary_outcome.description: Overall Survival is defined as the length of time from random assignment to death or to last contact.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At least 1 year following the conclusion of immunotherapy
secondary_outcome.description: Objective response rate is defined as the percentage of subjects having achieved confirmed Complete Response + Partial Response according to Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors 1.1（RECIST1.1）

arm_group.description: Anlotinib Day 1 to day 14 followed by 7 days off treatment in a 21-day cycle, Combined With Sintilimab 200mg/time，21-day cycle。

intervention.description: Anlotinib Day 1 to day 14 followed by 7 days off treatment in a 21-day cycle, Combined With Sintilimab 200mg/time，21-day cycle。

overall_official.affiliation: Changzhou Cancer Hospital of Soochow University

facility.name: Changzhou Cancer Hospital of Soochow University
